thread.title: Buy This House: A Gatsby-esque Hamptons Estate
thread.title_full: Buy This House: A Gatsby-esque Hamptons Estate | Maxim

author: Gabriella Paiella
title: Buy This House: A Gatsby-esque Hamptons Estate
text:
Where Is It? Watermill, NY—smack dab in the Hamptons .
The House: This is a mansion’s mansion: it’s stately and airy, all while dripping with opulence.
The Selling Point: This is true, old-school Gatsby luxury—it was commissioned by shipping magnate Edward P. Morse in 1919, so you’re getting all the Roaring Twenties glamour, with a 21st century remodel.
By the Numbers: 11 bedrooms (the master suite has six separate rooms), 16 bathrooms, 22,000 square feet, 1,200 feet of waterfront on Mecox Bay, 8 fireplaces, 1 heated pool, 1 sauna, 1 tennis court.
The price? Oh, just a $85,000,000.
Where Can You Buy It? From Sotheby’s International Realty .
Not the house for you? Check out the rest of our featured luxury properties here .
